name: Admin
description: [/admins] Administrative users that supervise the platform

name: Auth
description: [/auth] Authentication methods

name: Bans
description: [/bans] Read and manually release blocked Admins and Subscribers

name: ClearCallCounter
description: [/clearcallcounters] (Maintenance endpoint that only 'system' admin users can invoke) Clear call counters

name: Contact
description: [/contacts] Contacts contain data such as Full Name, Address, Phone and can belong to Resellers, Customers, Peering Groups

name: Contract
description: [/contracts] Contracts can belong to either a Customer, Reseller, or Peering

name: CustomerContact
description: [/customercontacts] Define Contacts that belong to Customers

name: CustomerNumber
description: [/customernumbers] A list of numbers of all subscribribers that belong to the Customer

name: CustomerSpeedDial
description: [/customerspeeddials] SpeedDial entries that defined for the Customer and available to all subscribers of the Customer

name: Domain
description: [/domains] Domain entries that are used by subscribers and in calls

name: Fileshare
description: [/fileshare] Share files between users of the platform and also the external ones

name: Journal
description: [/journals] Journal of the API operations performed on the platform

name: HeaderManipulation
description: [/header-manipulation] Available Header Manipulation related routes including sets, rules, actions and conditions

name: NCOS
description: [/ncos] Available NCOS related routes including Sets and their levels

name: Number
description: [/numbers] Available VOIP numbers

name: Pbx
description: [/pbx] Available PBX related routes including groups and their members

name: Product
description: [/products] Available products that a Customer can be created with

name: Reseller
description: [/resellers] Define platform resellers

name: SystemContact
description: [/systemcontacts] Define Contacts that belong to Resellers or Peering Groups

name: Userinfo
description: [/userinfo] Info about the current user, role, permissions

name: Voicemail
description: [/voicemails] Check available voicemails for a subscriber and also change their status (new/old)
